Kitsuno,

      Remember how I was asking about "Nojiri" ?  I
was wondering if you knew anything about a rebellion
that happened on Awaji island in 1870-ish that
involved the Inada-branch Hachisuka Clan vs. The Main
Hachisuka Branch from the Shikoku mainland. Some
Nojiri were involved and I think they were the
ancestors of my present day family .. (emphasis : "I
think".. not fully proven yet).

     Do you know anything about this ?

         Thanks.
